arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorDamager, idActorDamaged)

-- If the monster family is Bandit have them say something, if it's Cannibal they just attack.
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idStartingMonster) then
		if Hydra.ActorGetMonsterFamily(idStartingMonster) == "Bandit" then
			Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_BANDIT_INTRO_02, idStartingMonster)
		end
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idStartingMonster, true)
	end

end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)

-- If the monster family is Cannibal they attack when the player approaches.
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idStartingMonster) then
		if Hydra.ActorGetMonsterFamily(idStartingMonster) == "cannibal" then
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idStartingMonster, true)
		end
	end

end

arCallbackSets.unk_98d4504:
-- If the monster family is cannibal advance the quest.
if Hydra.ActorGetMonsterFamily(idStartingMonster) == "cannibal" then
	Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()
end

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(flTimeRemaining)
end

function Start()

-- Enable bandit spawners.
	for i, idBanditSpawners in ipairs(tBanditSpawners) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idBanditSpawners) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idBanditSpawners, false)
		end
	end
	
-- Set player team for the hostages.
	for i, idHostage in ipairs(tVillagers) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idHostage) then
			Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idHostage, Hydra.TEAM_PLAYER_DEFAULT)	
		end
	end
	
end

function Start(flTimeElapsed)

-- Grab a random hostage from those remaining.
	local nHostagesLeft = Hydra.ActorGroupGetCount(S_HOSTAGES)
	local nRandomHostage = Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, nHostagesLeft)
	idSelectedHostage = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_HOSTAGES)[nRandomHostage]

-- Bandits	
	local tBanditAttack = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_BANDITS)
	
-- Increment the counter for Elite spawns.
	nEliteSpawns = nEliteSpawns + 1
	
-- Set a variable to indicate that the villagers can start crying out for help.
	bVillagerCry = true
	
-- Have a random villager cry out for help. This will also cause Bandits to target them.	
	if nHostagesLeft >= 1 then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_VILLAGER_CONVO, idSelectedHostage)
	end
	
-- At certain intervals spawn an Elite.
	if nEliteSpawns == 3 and nHostagesLeft >= 1 then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idElite, false)
		Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(idElite)
	end
	
	if nEliteSpawns == 4 and nHostagesLeft >= 2 then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idElite, false)
		Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(idElite)
	end

	if nEliteSpawns == 5 and nHostagesLeft >= 3 then
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idElite, false)
		Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdate(idElite)
	end

end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
end

function Start(idActor)
end

function Start(szGroup)

end

function Start()

-- Disable bandit spawners.
	for i, idBanditSpawners in ipairs(tBanditSpawners) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idBanditSpawners) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idBanditSpawners, true)
		end
	end
	
-- For any villagers still alive set them to a neutral team to keep them from dying at this point.	
	if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idVillager01) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVillager01) then
		Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idVillager01, Hydra.TEAM_NEUTRAL)
	end
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idVillager02) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVillager02) then
		Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idVillager02, Hydra.TEAM_NEUTRAL)
	end
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idVillager03) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVillager03) then
		Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idVillager03, Hydra.TEAM_NEUTRAL)
	end

end

end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)

-- Drop a marker for npcs to run to when freed at the end.
	idLeaveMarker = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(S_ACTOR_MARKER_LOCATION, idActor, false, 0,0)

end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)

-- If the starting monster is a bandit have them say something as the player approaches.
	if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idStartingMonster) and Hydra.ActorIsValid(idStartingMonster) then
		if Hydra.ActorGetMonsterFamily(idStartingMonster) == "Bandit" then
			Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_BANDIT_INTRO_01, idStartingMonster)
		end
	end

end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)

-- Turn off the AI of the initial monster so they don't attack right away.
	idStartingMonster = idActorSpawned
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idStartingMonster, false)

end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

-- Villager rewards the player and then runs off.
	UF_RewardAndRun(idVillager01)
	
-- Trigger user event to count NPCs spoken to.
	Hydra.EventSend("TriggerEnd", idSelf)

end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

-- Villager rewards the player and then runs off.
	UF_RewardAndRun(idVillager02)

-- Trigger user event to count NPCs spoken to.
	Hydra.EventSend("TriggerEnd", idSelf)

end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

-- Villager rewards the player and then runs off.
	UF_RewardAndRun(idVillager03)

-- Trigger user event to count NPCs spoken to.
	Hydra.EventSend("TriggerEnd", idSelf)

end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)

end

function Start()

-- Triggers user event for any villagers who died.
	if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idVillager01) == false then
		Hydra.EventSend("TriggerEnd", idSelf)
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idVillager01Stake, true)
	end
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idVillager02) == false then
		Hydra.EventSend("TriggerEnd", idSelf)
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idVillager02Stake, true)
	end
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idVillager03) == false then
		Hydra.EventSend("TriggerEnd", idSelf)
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idVillager03Stake, true)
	end

end

end

end

szUserFunctionsScript:
----------------------------------------
-- NPCs thank the player and run away --
function UF_RewardAndRun(idVillager)

-- Have the NPC get out of the stocks.
	Hydra.QActorAnimAndNewIdle(idVillager, S_VILLAGER_FREE, S_VILLAGER_IDLE_ALT)

-- Start reward conversation.
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_VILLAGER_CONVO_REWARD, idVillager)

-- Drop reward and run away.
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.TreasureClassDropAtActor(idVillager, S_VILLAGER_REWARD)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idVillager, true)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idVillager, idLeaveMarker, "IGC_NPC_Sprint_Fast", false)
	Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idVillager, 1)

end
szOnStartupScript:
-- ======= CONSTANTS =======

-- Variables
	bVillagerCry = false
	nEliteSpawns = 0
	nRange = 10
	nRangeSqr = math.pow(nRange, 2)

-- Set villager tied up animation

for i, idHostage in ipairs(tVillagers) do
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idHostage) then
		Hydra.ActorSetAnimSetOverride(idHostage, S_VILLAGER_TIEDUP)
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idHostage, false)
		Hydra.ActorSetHitPointsPercent(idHostage, 0.5)
	end
end
